name: Protoception
tagline: A seed project for developing SPA prototypes
body:
### Introduction.
Protoception is a simple Node.js application for hosting an SPA prototype. Additionally, it provides a JSON database accessible at `localhost:3000/data/`. You can GET, PUT, POST, and DELETE any JSON data under this location. You can even do some querying using the [SpahQL](http://danski.github.io/spahql/index.html) API when doing a GET.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
